localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

nodes.excerpt: Flinkit Friends! is a new real world adventure game packed with codes to be cracked, clues to be uncovered, and puzzles to be solved. Battle Royale in the city. Fast, fun and easy to get going.
nodes.title: Flinkit Friends - Story-driven outdoor adventure games for teams, and friends
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: Kaboom is a fun JavaScript game programming library / environment. https://replit.com/kaboom https://replit.com/kaboom https://kaboomjs.com/ https://github.com/replit/kaboom
nodes.title: Kaboom - A fun JavaScript game programming library
nodes.author: tga

nodes.excerpt: Freehand Royale is built directly into Freehand, our online whiteboard for everyoneâ€”bring joy to your day while challenging teammates to a good â€˜ole fashioned game of space domination.
nodes.title: Freehand Royale - A game of intergalactic domination, in InVision Freehand
nodes.author: Clark Valberg

nodes.excerpt: Spark friendly competition with your team and boost morale, from Slack! People take turns drawing and guessing prompts. The faster you guess, the more points you get. Great for before a meeting, a Thursday social, or just taking a break. Up to 12 people.
nodes.title: Doodle - Pictionary, for Slack.
nodes.author: James Quinn

nodes.excerpt: Branch is your space for work and play! â € Bring back serendipity, spontaneous conversations, hallway bump-ins, watercooler chats and so much more that's missing in remote work with the collaborative and fun virtual HQ.
nodes.title: Branch 2.0 - Your space for work and play
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: Play board, card, and party games online with family and friends or gather your remote team for a fun team building activity. GameApart works with any video conference platform. New games are released monthly. Let's get this remote party started!
nodes.title: GameApart - Online board, card & party games on any video conference app
nodes.author: James Simmons

nodes.excerpt: Waving is a gamified social network, targeted for gen-z, we have the coolest features of other traditional social media but we added some sparks of gamification!!! Every action you make is converted to coins and you can change for new features and more range.
nodes.title: Waving - Gamified social network
nodes.author: Gabriel Cantarin

nodes.excerpt: SquadPal is the app for the life of your remote/hybrid team. Through games, challenges and fun activities, SquadPal helps you create a safe space to build better connections with your teammates. Get started today, it's free for teams of up to 20 people! ğŸ”¥
nodes.title: SquadPal - Build stronger connections & have fun with your remote team
nodes.author: Nichole Elizabeth DeMerÃ©

nodes.excerpt: A very simple font game for designers. Inspired by https://cantunsee.space/ ğŸ› This is the beta version. Any suggestions are welcome like bugs, feedback, domain name, etc.
nodes.title: Foont - A game for designers to identify fonts
nodes.author: BerkayğŸ¥¤

nodes.excerpt: Fancy Font is amazing tool which allows you to give a Fancy Look to your Smart Phone and app also facilitated you to create cool nickname for game too.
nodes.title: Fancy Fonts, Text and Nickname - Give fancy look to your phone & create unique game nickname
nodes.author: Tejas Bhatt

nodes.excerpt: isowords is an all new word search game for your phone. You can play solo, multiplayer, or compete in the daily challenge.
nodes.title: isowords - Word search on a vanishing cube
nodes.author: Zack Sears

nodes.excerpt: Salad is the easiest, most-trusted way to profit from your PC. Our users (or â€œChefsâ€) turn a wealth of idle compute resources into epic lootâ€”including Steam games, digital subscriptions, in-game loot, gift cards, and more.
nodes.title: Salad - The easiest, most-trusted way to profit from your PC
nodes.author: Salad Technologies

nodes.excerpt: Can you beat a Chess computer written with 1KB of Javascript?
nodes.title: The Kilobyte's Gambit - Try beating 1024 bytes of Javascript
nodes.author: Mahesh Shrestha

nodes.excerpt: An extremely entertaining musical guessing game where you race against friends to name that tune! "The music round of a pub quiz on steroids". Great for livening up a group Zoom call. Also includes single player quizzes and custom quiz creator.
nodes.title: Songlio - Free musical guessing game: race friends to name that tune
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: Find the five differences in each of the countless varied pictures in a given time. With daily challenges, as well as recurring events on great themes. Train your brain and your attention in the addictive puzzle game and keep yourself fit.
nodes.title: Differences - A spot difference puzzle game
nodes.author: LostVision Gamestudio

nodes.excerpt: Can you make time where there is none? We're two designers at Clockwise who built a video game to help us design a better algorithm.
nodes.title: Defragged â€” A game about calendars - Brought to you by the Clockwise Design Team
nodes.author: Raphael D'Amico

nodes.excerpt: Archimedes is the investment learning hub for everyone. Make investing a bigger part of your life by learning from a personal curriculum of bite-sized lessons, fun gameplay, and from a trusted community. Sign up and become a better investor today.
nodes.title: Archimedes - Investment learning hub for everyone
nodes.author: Clair Byrd

nodes.excerpt: We have created a motivating way for people to mix exercise and fun. It is a library of augmented reality games: Flappy Bird AR, Pong AR, and Brick Breaker AR. Do pushups to play the games. Go play at playar.ai and earn your spot on the leaderboard!
nodes.title: PlayAR - Augmented reality games to get you moving
nodes.author: Anika Mehrotra

nodes.excerpt: Introducing Minis, allowing users to add a game, a poll, or other interactive components directly into a room. Minis add to the current conversation, and offer new things to talk about. The first Minis include Polls, Would You Rather and Chosen At Random.
nodes.title: Soapbox Minis - Social audio just got a whole lot better, with mini games
nodes.author: Dean Eigenmann

nodes.excerpt: Prop Hero is an interactive gaming platform that allows fans of live sports to compete in the action by correctly predicting what is going to happen while they watch. Prop Hero can be embedded into broadcast streams or used as a second screen experience.
nodes.title: Prop Hero - Interactive predictor games for live sports
nodes.author: Daniel Greenberg

nodes.excerpt: Create games and interactive presentations for online events. Share your screen, engage your audience, and bring your community closer together. â € ğŸ’– Team building games ğŸ™Œ Icebreakers & trivia ğŸ“ˆ live surveys & polls ğŸ‘¨â€ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ‘¦â€ğŸ‘¦ group events

nodes.excerpt: HomeWerk helps teams to socialize and build stronger relationships regardless of location, time-zone and position within a company. We provide consistently positive automated team building sessions to keep teams talking about everything, apart from work!
nodes.title: HomeWerk - Helping teams stay happy whilst working remotely
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: Decentraland is a decentralized virtual reality platform powered by the Ethereum blockchain. Within the Decentraland platform, users can create, experience, and monetize their content and applications.
nodes.title: Decentraland 2.0 - Explore a virtual world owned by its users
nodes.author: Sam Drozdov

nodes.excerpt: Stay organized and social with Gamelib ~ Store your games in libraries, log playthroughs to your diary, rate and review games, follow friends, create custom ranked/unranked lists, see upcoming and popular games, and more.
nodes.title: Gamelib 2.0 - Keep track of, discover and socialize about games.
nodes.author: Benjamin Akar
